name: MovieData
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie data
des: The skill takes movie title and plot type (full or short) as inputs and fetches metadata like the date it was released, name of director and writer, genre and of course the summary or the detailed story of the movie based on the plot type chosen by the user. It pulls data form OMDB API.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
